result.name: pupil-related-data-for-statutory-assessments
result.notes:
Data collected on pupils for the administration and outcome of statutory assessments including entry information, access arrangements, teacher assessments and test results.  
The data does not contain any direct location or geographical information or any financial information. The data is updated periodically throughout a test cycle  a test cycle typically runs from September for around 15 to 18 months as information is gathered e.g. test results become available.
result.title: Pupil Related Data for Statutory Assessments

extras.value: Data set will not be published as it contains personal and sensitive personal data as defined by the Data Protection Act 1998.
